::Dark Rodimus::
   
  The new Generation Decepticon sits and waits for an activation order.

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
          
--- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:

> ::Dark Rodimus::
> 
> In his sub-councious Dark Rodimus can feel the spider spy on him
> and the probe inserted into the base of his neck. He wants to reach
> back scratch the "itch" but his body is still in a dorment
> deactivated state. He does nothing for now.

As the probe made contact with Dark Rodimus' spinal command module
(think brain stem) The probe swiftly began doing what it is programmed
to do - upload information, images, and data lifted from Rodimus'
cerebral cortex. Meanwhile the spider spy, hidden as it is, settled
down and fed, becoming totally motionless, perhaps even appearing to be
part of Dark Rodimus himself.

Preston
